title: 42 U.S. Code § 300aa-11 - Petitions for compensation
cleaned_text: initiated by [service](/definitions/uscode.php?width=840&height=800&iframe=true&def_id=42-USC-646160747-1342391136&term_occur=999&term_src=title:42:chapter:6A:subchapter:XIX:part:2:subpart:a:section:300aa-11)upon the [Secretary](/definitions/uscode.php?width=840&height=800&iframe=true&def_id=42-USC-1264422296-1342391138&term_occur=999&term_src=title:42:chapter:6A:subchapter:XIX:part:2:subpart:a:section:300aa-11)and the filing of a petition containing the matter prescribed by subsection (c) with the United States Court of Federal Claims. The clerk of the United States Court of Federal Claims shall immediately forward the filed petition to the chief special master for assignment to a special master under [section 300aa-12(d)(1) of this title](/uscode/text/42/300aa-12#d_1). [(2)] [(A) No person may bring a civil action for damages in an amount greater than $1,000 or in an unspecified amount against a vaccine administrator or manufacturer in a State or Federal court for damages arising from a] [vaccine-related injury or death](/definitions/uscode.php?width=840&height=800&iframe=true&def_id=42-USC-1228722061-798147825&term_occur=999&term_src=title:42:chapter:6A:subchapter:XIX:part:2:subpart:a:section:300aa-11)associated with the administration of a vaccine after October 1, 1988, and no such court may award damages in an amount greater than $1,000 in a civil action for damages for such a [vaccine-related injury or death,](/definitions/uscode.php?width=840&height=800&iframe=true&def_id=42-USC-1228722061-798147825&term_occur=999&term_src=title:42:chapter:6A:subchapter:XIX:part:2:subpart:a:section:300aa-11)unless a petition has been filed, in accordance with [section 300aa-16 of this title](/uscode/text/42/300aa-16), for compensation under the Program for such injury or death and— [(i)] [(I)] [section [section 300aa-21(a) of this title](/uscode/text/42/300aa-21#a)to file such an action, or [(ii)] [section 300aa-21(b) of this title](/uscode/text/42/300aa-21#b)or such petition is considered withdrawn under such section. [(B)] [section 300aa-16 of this title](/uscode/text/42/300aa-16), be considered the date the petition was filed if the petition was filed within one year of the date of the dismissal of the civil action. [(3)] [vaccine-related injury or death](/definitions/uscode.php?width=840&height=800&iframe=true&def_id=42-USC-1228722061-798147825&term_occur=999&term_src=title:42:chapter:6A:subchapter:XIX:part:2:subpart:a:section:300aa-11)associated with the administration of a vaccine after October 1, 1988. [(4)] [vaccine-related injury or death](/definitions/uscode.php?width=840&height=800&iframe=true&def_id=42-USC-1228722061-798147825&term_occur=999&term_src=title:42:chapter:6A:subchapter:XIX:part:2:subpart:a:section:300aa-11)or if such civil action was dismissed with prejudice, the person who brought such action may file a petition under subsection (b) for such injury or death. [(5)] [(A)] [vaccine-related injury or death](/definitions/uscode.php?width=840&height=800&iframe=true&def_id=42-USC-1228722061-798147825&term_occur=999&term_src=title:42:chapter:6A:subchapter:XIX:part:2:subpart:a:section:300aa-11)may, at any time within 2 years after October 1, 1988, or before judgment, whichever occurs first, petition to have such action dismissed without prejudice or costs and file a petition under subsection (b) for such injury or death. [(B)] [vaccine-related injury or death](/definitions/uscode.php?width=840&height=800&iframe=true&def_id=42-USC-1228722061-798147825&term_occur=999&term_src=title:42:chapter:6A:subchapter:XIX:part:2:subpart:a:section:300aa-11), such person may not file a petition under subsection (b) for such injury or death. [(6)] [vaccine-related injury or death](/definitions/uscode.php?width=840&height=800&iframe=true&def_id=42-USC-1228722061-798147825&term_occur=999&term_src=title:42:chapter:6A:subchapter:XIX:part:2:subpart:a:section:300aa-11)associated with the administration of a vaccine before November 15, 1988, such person may not file a petition under subsection (b) for such injury or death. [(7)] [vaccine-related injury or death](/definitions/uscode.php?width=840&height=800&iframe=true&def_id=42-USC-1228722061-798147825&term_occur=999&term_src=title:42:chapter:6A:subchapter:XIX:part:2:subpart:a:section:300aa-11)damages are awarded under a judgment of a court or a settlement of such action, the person who brought such action may not file a petition under subsection (b) for such injury or death. [(8)] [vaccine-related injury or death,](/definitions/uscode.php?width=840&height=800&iframe=true&def_id=42-USC-1228722061-798147825&term_occur=999&term_src=title:42:chapter:6A:subchapter:XIX:part:2:subpart:a:section:300aa-11)the person who brought such action may file a petition under subsection (b) for such injury or death. [(9)] [vaccine-related injury or death](/definitions/uscode.php?width=840&height=800&iframe=true&def_id=42-USC-1228722061-798147825&term_occur=999&term_src=title:42:chapter:6A:subchapter:XIX:part:2:subpart:a:section:300aa-11)and who is qualified to file a petition for compensation under the Program. [(10)] [[1]](#fn002401)is authorized to continue to receive, and forward, petitions for compensation for a [vaccine-related injury or death](/definitions/uscode.php?width=840&height=800&iframe=true&def_id=42-USC-1228722061-798147825&term_occur=999&term_src=title:42:chapter:6A:subchapter:XIX:part:2:subpart:a:section:300aa-11)associated with the administration of a vaccine on or after October 1, 1992. [(b) Petitioners] [(1)] [(A)] [legal representative](/definitions/uscode.php?width=840&height=800&iframe=true&def_id=42-USC-1065003548-798147828&term_occur=999&term_src=title:42:chapter:6A:subchapter:XIX:part:2:subpart:a:section:300aa-11)of such person if such person is a minor or is disabled, or the [legal representative](/definitions/uscode.php?width=840&height=800&iframe=true&def_id=42-USC-1065003548-798147828&term_occur=999&term_src=title:42:chapter:6A:subchapter:XIX:part:2:subpart:a:section:300aa-11)of any person who died as the result of the administration of a vaccine set forth in the [Vaccine Injury Table](/definitions/uscode.php?width=840&height=800&iframe=true&def_id=42-USC-1776139120-798147824&term_occur=999&term_src=title:42:chapter:6A:subchapter:XIX:part:2:subpart:a:section:300aa-11)may, if the person meets the requirements of subsection (c)(1), file a petition for compensation under the Program. [(B)] [vaccine-related injury or death](/definitions/uscode.php?width=840&height=800&iframe=true&def_id=42-USC-1228722061-798147825&term_occur=999&term_src=title:42:chapter:6A:subchapter:XIX:part:2:subpart:a:section:300aa-11)associated with a vaccine administered before October 1, 1988, if compensation has been paid under this part for 3500 petitions for such injuries or deaths. [(2)] [child](/definitions/uscode.php?width=840&height=800&iframe=true&def_id=42-USC-94631196-1720029752&term_occur=999&term_src=title:42:chapter:6A:subchapter:XIX:part:2:subpart:a:section:300aa-11)(as such term is defined in subsection (f)(2)) who was in utero at the time such woman was administered the vaccine. [(e) Schedule] The petitioner shall submit in accordance with a schedule set by the special master assigned to the petition assessments, evaluations, and prognoses and such other records and documents as are reasonably necessary for the determination of the amount of compensation to be paid to, or on behalf of, the person who suffered such injury or who died from the administration of the vaccine. [(f) Maternal immunization] [(1) In general] Notwithstanding any other provision of law, for purposes of this subpart, both a woman who received a covered vaccine while pregnant and any [child](/definitions/uscode.php?width=840&height=800&iframe=true&def_id=42-USC-94631196-1720029752&term_occur=999&term_src=title:42:chapter:6A:subchapter:XIX:part:2:subpart:a:section:300aa-11) who was in utero at the time such woman received the vaccine shall be considered persons to whom the covered vaccine was administered and persons who received the covered vaccine. [(2) Definition] As used in this subsection, the term " [child](/definitions/uscode.php?width=840&height=800&iframe=true&def_id=42-USC-94631196-1720029752&term_occur=999&term_src=title:42:chapter:6A:subchapter:XIX:part:2:subpart:a:section:300aa-11)" shall have the meaning given that term by subsections (a) and (b) of [section 8 of title 1](/uscode/text/1/8) except that, for purposes of this subsection, such section 8 shall be applied as if the term "include" in subsection (a) of such section were replaced with the term "mean".
